case.name: Galatea Revealed
case.description: Galatea is a talking statue and has just turned around to face the other players.

markers.marker: Galatea answers what she wants to become.
Galatea sort of explains the origin of her name.
Galatea comments on what outfit she'd like to wear.
Galatea answers what sort of job she'd want.
Galatea says she's not very big into mastication.
Galatea answers what she'd like to be addressed as.
Galatea asks if anyone has seen her artist. (She is unaware of his passing).
Galatea turned after her final strip to show her butt.
Opens up Galatea's more confident nature through learning.
Galatea tells about the critics that used to judge her, typically for her speech, ablity to move, and how much there was she could react to.
Galatea mentions that she has cried without having tear ducts before, so maybe she can ejaculate as well
Opens up Galatea's more dominant nature through learning.
Galatea mistakely assumes that encouraging the masterbators is a part of the game.
Opens up Galatea's more embarrassed nature through learning.
This is Galatea's first time seeing a penis that wasn't on an art piece.
Galatea wonders why no one is using the bed if they all require sleep.
Galatea answers Meia's prompt by sharing her own limited experience on Earth.
Galatea asks the group if there's anything they need to get off their chest before they continue with the game.
Galatea turns around to address he other players for the first time that game.
Opens up Galatea's more indifferent nature through learning.
Galatea clairifies what artist means.
Galatea explains her sleeping (or lack there of) arrangements.
Galatea has a small existential crisis after learning about cougars.
Galatea is confused by Jessie's offer to help her reach climax.
Galatea other hot robot babes in her gallery.
Galatea wonders what's so great about alcohol?
Galatea is less confident that she also remembered underwear after Jolyne's... incident.
Galatea is comforted by Jolyne's words about what makes her alive.
Galatea admits to killing a critic who pushed his luck too far.
Opens up Galatea's more kind nature through learning.
Galatea relives her struggles with her artist's declining mental state and subsequent abandonment of her.
Galatea goes over a simplified way to think about what an animate is.
Galatea talks about her dress and Komi-san.
Galatea talks about one critic who treated her like a person for the first time in her life.
Galatea and Komi-san become friends!
Galatea acknowledges that she probably won't be able to masturbate back in the gallery.
Galatea is confused internally about how someone would fit a pillow inside them for masturbation.
Komi reminds Galatea about the work of a famous animate artist.
Galatea wants both Komi and herself to do their best.
Galatea responds to Mary about her quest to find out what she is.
Galatea asks Mary about a situation similar to her own.
Opens up Galatea's more mean nature through learning.
Galatea responds to Meia responding to Galatea responding to Meia's prompt marker
Galatea decline's Misato's beer offer, despite never having one before.
Galatea answers if she's cursed.
Galatea is curious about how mulan would know someone from Greece.
Opens up Galatea's more robotic nature through learning.
Opens up Galatea's more supernatural nature through learning.
Galatea describes her gallery, filled with animates (robots) much like herself.
Just a crude joke, nothing worth noting.
Galatea thinks about the gallery where she used to be shown off
